text.old:
Introduction[edit]

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur vitae neque at felis placerat consequat. This is described in the introduction of the themes and principles. However, the scope is not isolated and can be challenging to delineate. This chapter describes the process, positioning, and particularly the collaboration in more detail. This is important as a starting point for further elaboration of the business architecture.

Perspectives on the Process[edit]

The process can be described and defined from various perspectives. These perspectives largely coincide, although some inconsistencies may arise. The business architecture approaches this pragmatically.

Below, we highlight some common perspectives on the process.

e tsd ad asdd dsasda
